title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
hem as soon as possible. You will have two dialogue options to choose from here:

Family? A friend? A lover? Seems personal. I won't pry, if it's not something you want to talk about.

Choosing the second option will make her appreciate your decision not meddling with personal matters. Now this will give you the same dialogue options from before but one being removed:

You must have thoughts about our little stowaways. How am I holding up in your estimations? Turn to other matters.
